Summary: 2 egg globe of lights flying close my home at 250 meters heading south
divs: Sighting DetailsBy the 26 april 2008 at 9-40 pm i was loocking at the sky just out side my home when i saw 2 lites very bright flying toward south. Those two where pilotes by inteligent being cause they where flying like two kids whit ther dads car.They where flying heraticly like they where playing whit their ship...i was amaze but i figure very rapidly what they where. Those alien craft where very bright Amber color ,few meters wide flying witout sound like floting on the air ... They where very close from me (250 metres or so) at the closest. i ad look for them for 3 minutes then they disapear...i realy wish to to more of those soon... We are not alone !!!:)
